title: Row erupts over cost of Labour's home insulation plan
description: Labour has rejected as "bogus" an analysis by government officials that its plan to improve home energy efficiency would cost £12-15bn a year. The party has said the measures, part of a wider £28bn green investment plan, would be capped at £6bn a year.

title: Gaza ceasefire: Israel's PM Benjamin Netanyahu rejects Hamas's proposed terms
description: Israel's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has rejected Hamas's proposed ceasefire terms - saying "total victory" in Gaza is possible within months. He was speaking after Hamas laid out a series of demands in response to an Israel-backed ceasefire proposal.

title: Government agency failed to protect major river from chicken waste, court hears
description: Campaigners have accused a government agency of failing to apply the law and stop excess nutrients from polluting a major river on the first day of a hearing.
